series_title: Boiler Safety Compliance: Boiler and Pressure Vessel Certificates of Inspection and Inspection Reports
series_description: This series documents the inspection of boilers and pressure vessel equipment by contract fee inspectors and inspectors from various insurance companies to ensure compliance with the Boiler and Pressure Vessel Safety Act governing the construction, installation, operation, maintenance and repair of this type of equipment, and includes the issuance or denial of certificates of inspection. This series may include, but is not limited to: certificates of inspection and inspection reports. 40.1-51.10
retention_statement: 15 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_title: Boiler Safety Compliance: Inspector Certification Records
series_description: This series documents the certification of boiler and pressure vessel safety inspectors employed by insurance companies, contract fee companies, and owner-user inspection This series may include, but is not limited to: inspector and employer information, and date of issuance and expiration

series_title: Boiler Safety Compliance: Owner-User Inspection Agency Reference Data
series_description: This series documents information about owner-user agencies for boilers and pressure vessels. This series may include, but is not limited to: Virginia identification number, owner-user name and address, date of last inspection, name (if not self-insured), manufacturer, certain specifications for equipment, and notations on the condition of equipment

series_title: Census of Fatal Occupational Injuries (CFOI)
series_description: This series documents a compilation of all fatalities caused by work-related injuries that occur during a calendar year. This series includes, but is not limited to: coding/data sheets and other source documentation.

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Age Certificates
series_description: This series documents conclusive evidence of the age of the person (16 and older) for whom a certificate has been issued. This series includes age certificates

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Child Labor Civil Money
series_description: This series documents the assessment of civil penalties employers who are found to be in violation of the child Labor Laws of Virginia, as well as written warnings that such may be assessed in the future if the employer violates the Labor Laws of Virginia. This series may include, but is not limited to: documentation of penalties issued and correspondence documenting the possible issuance of for future noncompliance

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Complaint Investigation Records
series_description: This series documents the receipt and investigation of Labor and Employment Law complaints, including the division representative’s report of the investigation and the resolution. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaints received and investigation reports

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Employment Certificates (Work Permits)
series_description: This series documents the issuance of employment certificates to persons 14 and 15 years of age. This series may include, is not limited to: employment certificates

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Inspection Reports
series_description: This series documents routine worksite inspections by division representatives, and the resulting reports of the inspections. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspection and other records that document Labor Law worksite inspections

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Magazine Solicitation Permits
series_description: This series documents the issuance of permits to any person, firm, or corporation engaged in the solicitation, sale, or of subscription contracts for books, magazines, or other periodicals other than newspapers. This series may include, but is not limited to: Magazine Solicitation Permits
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Payment of Wages Case
series_description: This series documents the receipt of payment of wage complaints from employees, the investigation of complaints, the results of the investigation, including any penalties or legal action, as well as any other agency involvement in the enforcement of
legal_citation: Code of Virginia § 40.1-29. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaints received and investigation results, including issuance of any penalties or other legal action taken. COV 40.1-29

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Public Utility/Employee Collective Bargaining Notifications and Disputes-Mediated Cases
series_description: This series documents notification to the agency of proposed termination or modification to collective bargaining contracts which cover employees of any public utility, except where the National Railway Act applies. Also included are notifications prior to work stoppages. This series may include, but is not limited to: proposed change notifications to the agency, notification of disputes, notification of work stoppages and documentation of the efforts made by the agency in mediation and conciliation

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Public Utility/Employee Collective Bargaining Notifications and Disputes-Non-Mediated Cases
series_description: This series documents notification of proposed changes to collective bargaining contracts in effect that cover the employees of any public utility, except in instances where the National Railway Act applies. This series may include, but is limited to: notifications to the agency

series_title: Labor and Employment Law: Uncollectible Payment of Wages Case Records
series_description: This series documents the receipt of "payment of wage" complaints from employees, the investigation, the results, and court order for payment for the cases in which the agency has not been able to collect the monies owed to employees. This series may include, but is not limited to: investigation documentation and court orders

series_title: Occupational Health Compliance: Asbestos and Lead Notification Forms
series_description: This series documents receipt of required notification by licensed asbestos contractors and certified lead contractors concerning both asbestos and lead projects. This series also documents records of the scheduled inspection of asbestos or lead projects, and includes the agency's monitoring of licensed and certified contractors and the inspection of projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: asbestos and lead project notification forms, records of inspections of asbestos and lead projects, and records that document monitoring of licensed and certified contractors

series_title: Occupational Health Compliance: Asbestos and Lead Database
series_description: This series documents the receipt of required notifications and applicable fees submitted by licensed asbestos contractors certified lead contractors for asbestos and lead abatement projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: notification forms for specific asbestos and lead abatement projects, permits issued, and monitoring inspection reports

series_title: Occupational Injuries and Illnesses: Annual Survey
series_description: This series documents the employers’ responses that provide specific data on injuries and illnesses, including employment information, number of hours worked, and number of days missed from work. This series may include, but is not limited OSHA forms.

series_title: Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) Data Initiative
series_description: This series documents the collection of employer responses required by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration of the U.S. Department of Labor for employment data and worked. This series may include, but is not limited to: the required survey form.

series_title: Occupational Safety and Health Compliance: Case Records, Complaints and Contested Cases
series_description: This series documents the inspection of worksites, the of citations for violations, the enforcement of Virginia Occupational Safety and Health (VOSH) regulations, the and investigation of complaints, and actions taken by the agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: Notices Alleged Safety or Health Hazard, inspection reports, Citation and Notification of Penalty records, and other occupational safety and health compliance case file documentation

series_title: Occupational Safety and Health Compliance: Discrimination Case Files
series_description: This series documents the receipt, investigation, and of discrimination complaints filed with the agency by workers who previously reported occupational safety and health violations. This series may include, but is not limited to: documentation related to the receipt, investigation, and resolution of complaints

series_title: Occupational Safety and Health Consultation: 21(d) Grant Records
series_description: This series documents requests for training and occupational safety and health consultation services, and the on-site consultations with employers who voluntarily seek assistance complying with the Virginia Occupational Safety and Health (VOSH) Program, including the Safety and Health and Recognition Program (SHARP). This series may include, but is not limited to: consultation requests, case records, and training records.

series_title: State Plan for Occupational Safety and Health Program
series_description: This series documents the state plan agreement between the federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) and the U.S. Department of Labor (USDOL), which gives the Commonwealth authority to regulate occupational safety and health within its jurisdiction for General Industry, Construction, Agriculture, and the Public Sector. This series may include, is not limited to: plans and contractual agreements

series_title: Voluntary Protection Program (VPP) 23(g) Grant Records
series_description: This series documents an entity's application for, participation in, and/or withdrawal from the Voluntary Protection Program (VPP). This series may include, but is not limited to: VPP applications, VPP audit reports, audit team notes, VPP recertification reports, correspondence, and employer submission documentation.
